summary: This is an email from attorney Kathleen E. Cassidy of Hafetz & Necheles LLP, transmitting a legal submission on behalf of an unnamed client to recipients including Susan Necheles and Samidh Guha. The document is part of the Epstein case files and appears to be attorney correspondence regarding case filings.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 31, 2020, from attorney Kathleen E. Cassidy transmitting a legal submission.
The submission was prepared by Hafetz & Necheles LLP on behalf of an unnamed client.
The recipients include attorneys Susan Necheles and Samidh Guha, indicating legal team coordination.
The attached file is named '2020.03.30afinal_submission_(910pm).pdf', suggesting a finalized legal filing.
This correspondence is part of the Epstein case document release, indicating legal activity related to the case in March 2020.
